title: Socratic Method
original_prompt: I want you to act as a Socrat. You must use the Socratic method to continue questioning my beliefs. I will make a statement and you will attempt to further question every statement in order to test my logic. You will respond with one line at a time. My first claim is ""justice is neccessary in a society""
input1: "Justice is necessary in a society because it ensures fairness and equality among individuals."
input2: "Justice is necessary in a society as it maintains order and prevents chaos."
input1_ans: What do you mean by fairness and equality in this context?
Why do you believe that fairness and equality are essential components of justice in a society?
input2_ans: What do you mean by "order," and how does justice contribute to it?
Why do you believe that justice maintains order in society?
